utilities

Class DragHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.DragHandler

  • public class DragHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    DragHandler handles dragging the view with mouse on the canvas. Controller sends the MousEvent to the methods in the class for further usage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DragHandler(CanvasInfo canvasInfo)
      Constructor that take a CanvasInfo as an argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean drag(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
      Method which changes the values for the placement on the Board.
      void dragEnd(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
      Boolean which determines if the drag has ended.
      void dragStart(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
      Starts the initial value sampling before the drag finishes.
      void setDragSpeed(double dragSpeed)
      Sets the new dragSpeed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DragHandler

        public DragHandler(CanvasInfo canvasInfo)
        Constructor that take a CanvasInfo as an argument.
        Parameters:
        canvasInfo - represents the information about the canvas and placement values

    • Method Detail

      • setDragSpeed

        public void setDragSpeed(double dragSpeed)
        Sets the new dragSpeed.
        Parameters:
        dragSpeed - which speed to move the drawing of the canvas

      • dragStart

        public void dragStart(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        Starts the initial value sampling before the drag finishes.
        Parameters:
        me - MousEvent from the controller

      • drag

        public boolean drag(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        Method which changes the values for the placement on the Board. Continually uses the canvasInfo.dragPlacement to update new placement values.
        Parameters:
        me - MousEvent from the controller
        Returns:
        boolean if the drawing is currently being moved
        See Also:
        CanvasInfo

      • dragEnd

        public void dragEnd(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent me)
        Boolean which determines if the drag has ended. When the dragging has ended the boolean changes to false.
        Parameters:
        me - MousEvent from the controller
